feed.title: Two Proposed BIPs - Bluetooth Communication and bitcoin: URI Scheme Improvements

entry.title: Two Proposed BIPs - Bluetooth Communication and bitcoin: URI Scheme Improvements
entry.summary: In an email dated 02/06/2015, Andy Schroder asked about a more appropriate place to discuss certain issues at length. He questioned the suitability of the mailing list for discussing all types of issues.
